title: Modern Pedagogical Shifts in Sports Coaching: Nonlinear and Individualized Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Theories of Sports Coaching and Understanding of Traditional Training Methods
context.additional_context: Integrated theory-practice education for current professionals to acquire modern teaching methodologies applicable to real-world coaching settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three differences between traditional teaching methods and modern nonlinear approaches in sports coaching.
Learners can develop and demonstrate at least two Representative Learning Design strategies tailored to individual athlete characteristics.
Learners can write case reports applying modern teaching methods to real-world coaching scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
